Definition: Number of years of professional experience
Annual income of the customer (in thousands USD)
Average spending on credit cards per month (in thousands USD)
Value of mortgage held with Universal Bank, if any (in thousands USD)
Does the customer have a certificate of deposit (CD) account with the bank? (1= yes, 0 = no)
Does the customer use internet banking facilities? (1= yes, 0 = no)
Does the customer use a credit card issued by Universal Bank? (1= yes, 0 = no)
Did this customer accept the personal loan offered in the last campaign? (1= yes, 0= no)
